name: Catapult (TobyDev)
description:
Overview

Catapult is a game made for the Weekly Game Jam 172, "Catapult". It is a physics based game with a ragdoll and a catapult (as the name suggests).  

This is an extremely unfinished game. I am enjoying working on this project but it's nowhere near finished. Any comments and suggestions would be very helpful. I'm planning to continue working on it, but that may change.

WEB VERSION

https://tobydev.itch.io/catapult-web-build

Instructions

Use the A and D keys to move left and right. Use the W key to jump. Use the E key to go into ragdoll mode. Use R to exit ragdoll mode. Lastly when you are near enough to the catapult, the spacebar will set it off. At any time escape will bring up the pause menu.

Credits

The music in the main scene is Battle Theme A by Cynic Music
